example.eg: The only aspect of city living that Bob hated was the noise.
example.egtrans: 鲍勃唯一憎恨城市生活的地方就是噪音。

example.eg: Larry's beard gave him the aspect of a lumberjack.
example.egtrans: 拉里的胡子让他有了一幅伐木工的样子。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 外貌, 外表, 样子

example.eg: The ship's aspect made docking difficult.
example.egtrans: 船的朝向让船很难入港。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 方位, 方向, 朝向

example.eg: She usually has a happy and optimistic aspect.
example.egtrans: 她的神情一般既欢欣、又乐观向上。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 面貌, 神情, 神态

example.eg: This exercise tests students' knowledge of aspect; they have to choose between past simple and past continuous.
The aspect ratio on the DVD recorder is not set right, so the Miss America contestants look wider than they are tall!

trans_examp.trans_cn: 图像纵横比，图像宽高比
